On Wednesday 10 November 2004 15:53, Karl Meredith wrote:
> I have successfully implemented the changes need in Cantera to model
> 1-D adiabatic flames, and thus predict laminar flame speeds.  It
> seems to work very well, having tested it for GRI 3.0 over a wide
> range of equivalence ratio.
>
> I think it would be nice if this capability was added to the CVS
> repository.  Let me know if you're interested.
>
> Karl

Yes. Now I will be able to use Cantera  like PREMIX. I need to calculate the 
flame speed of gas turbine fuels.
Thanks and hope they will be in Cantera soon.
osman
